title: Highest Portfolio Investment
description: In 2023, the United Kingdom had the highest net portfolio investment in the world, amounting to $222.78 billion.

title: Most New Businesses Registered
description: In 2022, the United Kingdom registered 790,311 new businesses, the highest number globally.

title: Perfect Persistence to Grade 5
description: In 2021, the United Kingdom achieved a 100% persistence rate for male students reaching grade 5.

title: Lowest Battle-related Deaths
description: In 2019, the United Kingdom recorded only 1 battle-related death, the lowest in the world.
